nodes.text: The Junction-Tierell Loop was a hyperspace route loop largely in the Gordian Reach that traversed from Feriae Junction to Tierell, both on the Hydian Way. The systems it served were known as the Loop Worlds. The loop circled the Denarii Nebula on its way through the Reach to The Roil and back to Thesme sector.
Tierell is incorrectly spelled "Tierrel" on the Gordian Reach map of The Essential Atlas.
